greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse permutation to A278503.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: (Scheme) (define (A278504 n) (let ((row (A278539 n)) (col (A278538 n))) (* (/ 1 2) (- (expt (+ row col) 2) row col col col -2))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 23 2016
